name: Nat6
description:
This was our entry for the GMTK Jam 2022. We had 48hrs to create something with the theme "ROLL OF THE DICE".

Play as Nathaniel, a flamboyant fedora-wearing D6 as you embark on a wacky adventure on a gigantic chessboard. Fight against other well-known board game pieces to obtain those sweet sweet poker chips. Will you roll a Nat6 and be victorious or will your luck end - no dice?

                  

Controls

Use your mouse to hover and click on buttons in the Main Menu

WASD to move

During combat, click the Attack button with your mouse

                  

Credits

misterpicklez - Lead Programmer

Suharun - UI/Combat
